basic.description:
An intermediate study of representations of the city in cinema and visual culture, the social histories from which these representations emerge, and the changing environments in which cinema is viewed.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36L;24Lb;48P)
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Cinema and the City

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and [a grade of B- in FILM110 (or FILM104&106) and 6.0 units in FILM or (GPHY101 and GPHY227 and GPHY229 and Level 3 in a GPHY Plan).
